1629900.name: Infinite Pixel Battles
1629900.description:
Megapixeled battle field is waiting for You!

  • Draw different pixels and create unique art. There are millions colors to choose.
  • Choose specific pixel type to place. Each one has different effects, health points or cooldown.
  • Place your tag! With each pixel you will leave a short text message that everyone can read.
  • Meet all the players of Infinite Pixel Battles. Witness their artworks and read their messages. Or beat 'em all to get the highest score on the worldwide leaderboard and write your name in history of Infinite Pixel Battles!

And remember to follow the White Rabbit…
1629900.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语
